field_recall_reason_description: Due to possible contamination with Listeria monocytogenes
title: Pita Pal Foods, LP Recalls Various Hummus and Dips Due to Possible Health Risk
description: Pita Pal Foods, LP of Houston, TX has issued a voluntary recall of certain hummus products made between May 15, 2019 through July 11, 2019, due to concerns over Listeria monocytogenes, which was identified at the manufacturing facility (not in finished product) during an FDA inspection.
